resources.string: Without location permissions app won\'t be able to access Wi-Fi network names which is crucial part for automation.
Starting with Android 10, background services are restricted to start apps/activities on users screen, meaning it won\'t be able to launch Android Auto without this permission.
Starting with Android 10, location needs to be "Allowed all the time" in order to connect Wireless Android Auto
Please turn on Wi-Fi to start Wireless Android Auto
This will turn the service off that connects Wireless Android Auto if it loses bluetooth connection. Recommended for users that car\'s screen is not turning hotspot off after turning the car off.
Select on which Bluetooth devices to start this app
Bluetooth was off, re open it again
Adds a button in service notification to force connection to car\'s screen (needs service restart)
This will start Wi-Fi service to connect Wireless Android Auto.
Note: Consider if car\'s screen is rooted it can reset hotspot settings to default (HUR/AndroidAutoConnect) every time it starts
Service is connected to car\'s screen
Service is looking for car\'s screen
Headunit Reloaded Wi-Fi Service is running trying to connect Wireless Android Auto
